GSP32vaissu1u:4: pṛthivy āpas tejo vāyur ākāśaṃ kālo dig ātmā mana iti dravyāṇi | KVs_1,1.4 |
GSP32vaissu1u:5: rūparasagandhasparśāḥ saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve buddhayaḥ sukhaduḥkhe icchādveṣau prayatnaś ca guṇāḥ | KVs_1,1.5 |
GSP32vaissu1u:6: utkṣepaṇam avakṣepaṇam ākuñcanaṃ prasāraṇaṃ gamanam iti karmāṇi | KVs_1,1.6 |
GSP32vaissu1u:7: sad anityaṃ dravyavat kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ sāmānyaviśeṣavad iti dravyaguṇakarmaṇām aviśeṣaḥ | KVs_1,1.7 |
GSP32vaissu1u:14: kriyāvad guṇavat samavāyikāraṇam iti dravyalakṣaṇam | KVs_1,1.14 |
GSP32vaissu1u:15: dravyāśrayy aguṇavān saṃyogavibhāgeṣv akāraṇam anapekṣa iti guṇalakṣaṇam | KVs_1,1.15 |
GSP32vaissu1u:16: ekadravyam aguṇaṃ saṃyogavibhāgeṣv anapekṣaṃ kāraṇam iti karmalakṣaṇam | KVs_1,1.16 |
GSP32vaissu1u:23: dvitvaprabhṛtayaś ca saṃkhyāḥ pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgāś ca | KVs_1,1.23 |
GSP32vaissu1u:24: asamavāyāt sāmānyaṃ karma kāryaṃ na vidyate | KVs_1,1.24 |
GSP32vaissu1u:34: dravyatvaṃ guṇatvaṃ karmatvaṃ ca sāmānyāni viśeṣāś ca | KVs_1,2.5 |
GSP32vaissu1u:39: guṇakarmasu ca bhāvān na karma na guṇaḥ | KVs_1,2.10 |
GSP32vaissu1u:49: rūparasasparśavatya āpo dravāḥ snigdhāś ca | KVs_2,1.2 |
GSP32vaissu1u:53: sarpirjatumadhūcchiṣṭānāṃ pārthivānām agnisaṃyogād dravatādbhiḥ sāmānyam | KVs_2,1.6 |
GSP32vaissu1u:54: trapusīsaloharajatasuvarṇānāṃ taijasānām agnisaṃyogād dravatādbhiḥ sāmānyam | KVs_2,1.7 |
GSP32vaissu1u:55: viṣāṇī kakudmān prāntevāladhiḥ sāsnāvān iti gotve dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgam | KVs_2,1.8 |
GSP32vaissu1u:57: na ca dṛṣṭānāṃ sparśa ity adṛṣṭaliṅgo vāyuḥ | KVs_2,1.10 |
GSP32vaissu1u:60: adravyavattvena nityatvam uktam (C,BhV) (V adravyatvenānityam, U adravyatvena) | KVs_2,1.13 |
GSP32vaissu1u:62: vāyor iti sati snnikarṣe pratyakṣābhāvād dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ na vidyate | KVs_2,1.15 |
GSP32vaissu1u:67: niṣkramaṇaṃ praveśanam ity ākāśasya liṅgam | KVs_2,1.20 |
GSP32vaissu1u:71: kāraṇaguṇapūrvaḥ kārye guṇo dṛṣṭaḥ kāryāntarāprādurbhāvāc ca śabdaḥ sparśavatām aguṇaḥ | KVs_2,1.24 |
GSP32vaissu1u:72: paratra samavāyāt pratyakṣatvāc ca nātmaguṇo na manoguṇaḥ | KVs_2,1.25 |
GSP32vaissu1u:76: puṣpavastrayoḥ sati sannikarṣe gandhāntarāprādurbhāvo vastre gandhābhāvaliṅgam | KVs_2,2.1 |
GSP32vaissu1u:81: aparasmin paraṃ yugapad ayugapac ciraṃ kṣipram iti kālaliṅgāni | KVs_2,2.6 |
GSP32vaissu1u:87: ita idam iti yatas tad diśo liṅgam | KVs_2,2.12 |
GSP32vaissu1u:91: ādityasaṃyogād bhūtapūrvād bhaviṣyato bhūtāc ca prācī | KVs_2,2.16 |
GSP32vaissu1u:92: tathā dakṣiṇā pratīcy udīci ca | KVs_2,2.17 |
GSP32vaissu1u:94: sāmānyapratyakṣād viśeṣāpratyakṣād viśeṣasmṛteś ca saṃśayaḥ | KVs_2,2.19 |
GSP32vaissu1u:100: tasmin dravyaṃ karma guṇa iti saṃśayaḥ | KVs_2,2.25 |
GSP32vaissu1u:101: tulyajātīyeṣv arthāntarabhūteṣu ca viśeṣasyobhayathā dṛṣṭatvāt | KVs_2,2.26 |
GSP32vaissu1u:111: saṃyogād vibhāgāc chabdāc ca śabdaniṣpatteḥ | KVs_2,2.36 |
GSP32vaissu1u:125: anya eva hetur ity anapadeśaḥ | KVs_3,1.7 |
GSP32vaissu1u:136: viṣāṇī tasmād aśvo viṣāṇī tasmād gaur iti ca | KVs_3,1.12 |
GSP32vaissu1u:137: ātmendriyamano'rthasannikarṣād yan niṣpadyate tad anyat | KVs_3,1.13 |
GSP32vaissu1u:138: pravṛttinivṛttī ca pratyagātmani dṛṣṭe paratra liṅgam | KVs_3,1.14 |
GSP32vaissu1u:139: ātmendriyārthasannikarṣe jñānasyābhāvo bhāvaś ca manaso liṅgam | KVs_3,2.1 |
GSP32vaissu1u:142: prāṇāpānanimeṣonmeṣajīvanamanogatīndriyāntaravikārāḥ sukhaduḥkhe icchādveṣau prayatnaś cety ātmaliṅgāni | KVs_3,2.4 |
GSP32vaissu1u:144: yajñadatta iti sati sannikarṣe pratyakṣābhāvād dṛṣṭaṃ liṅgaṃ na vidyate | KVs_3,2.6 |
GSP32vaissu1u:148: yadi ca dṛṣṭapratyakṣo 'haṃ devadatto 'haṃ yajñadatta iti | KVs_3,2.10 |
GSP32vaissu1u:149: devadatto gacchati viṣṇumitro gacchatīti copacārāc charīrapratyakṣaḥ | KVs_3,2.11 |
GSP32vaissu1u:151: aham iti pratyagātmani bhāvāt paratrābhāvād arthāntarapratyakṣaḥ | KVs_3,2.13 |
GSP32vaissu1u:152: na tu śarīraviśeṣād yajñadattaviṣṇumitrayor jñānaviśeṣaḥ | KVs_3,2.14 |
GSP32vaissu1u:164: anekadravyeṇa dravyeṇa samavāyād rūpaviśeṣāc copalabdhiḥ | KVs_4,1.9 |
GSP32vaissu1u:167: saṃkhyāḥ parimāṇāni pṛthaktvaṃ saṃyogavibhāgau paratvāparatve karma ca rūpidravyasamavāyāc cākṣuṣāṇi | KVs_4,1.12 |
GSP32vaissu1u:169: etena guṇatve bhāve ca sarvendriyajñānaṃ vyākhyātam | KVs_4,1.14 |
GSP32vaissu1u:170: pratyakṣāpratyakṣāṇām apratyakṣatvāt saṃyogasya pañcātmakaṃ na vidyate | KVs_4,2.1 |
GSP32vaissu1u:171: guṇāntarāprādurbhāvāc ca tryātmakam api na | KVs_4,2.2 |
GSP32vaissu1u:172: ātmasaṃyogas tv avipratiṣiddho mithaḥ pañcānām | KVs_4,2.3 |
GSP32vaissu1u:181: abhighātaje musalakarmaṇi vyatirekād akāraṇaṃ hastasaṃyogaḥ | KVs_5,1.3 |
GSP32vaissu1u:183: musalābhighātāt tu musalasaṃyogād dhaste karma | KVs_5,1.5 |
GSP32vaissu1u:186: nodanaviśeṣābhāvād nordhvaṃ na tiryag gamanam | KVs_5,1.8 |
GSP32vaissu1u:194: iṣāv ayugapat saṃyogaviśeṣāḥ karmānyatve hetuḥ | KVs_5,1.16 |
GSP32vaissu1u:195: nodanād ādyam iṣoḥ karma karmakāritāc ca saṃskārād uttaraṃ tathottaram uttaraṃ ca | KVs_5,1.17 |
GSP32vaissu1u:197: nodanād abhighātāt saṃyuktasaṃyogāc ca pṛthivyāṃ karma | KVs_5,2.1 |
GSP32vaissu1u:205: apāṃ saṅghāto vilayanaṃ ca tejasaḥ saṃyogāt | KVs_5,2.9 |
GSP32vaissu1u:208: apāṃ saṃyogād vibhāgāc ca stanayitnuḥ | KVs_5,2.12 |
GSP32vaissu1u:209: pṛthivīkarmaṇā tejaḥkarma vāyukarma ca vyākhyātam | KVs_5,2.13 |
GSP32vaissu1u:210: agner ūrdhvajvalanaṃ vāyoś ca tiryagpavanam aṇumanasoś cādyaṃ karmety adṛṣṭakāritāni | KVs_5,2.14 |
GSP32vaissu1u:213: ātmasthe manasi saśarīrasya sukhaduḥkhābhāvaḥ sa yogaḥ | KVs_5,2.17 |
GSP32vaissu1u:215: apasarpaṇam upasarpaṇam aśitapītasaṃyogaḥ kāryāntarasaṃyogāś cety adṛṣṭakāritāni | KVs_5,2.19 |
GSP32vaissu1u:219: dikkālāv ākāśaṃ ca kriyāvadbhyo vaidharmyān niṣkriyāṇi | KVs_5,2.23 |
GSP32vaissu1u:220: etena karmāṇi guṇāś ca vyākhyātāḥ | KVs_5,2.24 |
GSP32vaissu1u:249: iṣṭarūparasagandhasparśaṃ prokṣitam abhyukṣitaṃ ca tac chuci | KVs_6,2.6 |
GSP32vaissu1u:252: ayatasya śucibhojanād abhyudayo na vidyate yamābhāvāt | KVs_6,2.9 |
GSP32vaissu1u:265: idam evaṃguṇam idam evaṃguṇam iti coktam | KVs_7,1.3 |
GSP32vaissu1u:270: apsu tejasi vāyau ca nityā dravyanityatvāt | KVs_7,1.8 |
GSP32vaissu1u:273: apsu tejasi vāyau ca kāraṇaguṇapūrvāḥ pākajā na vidyante | KVs_7,1.11 |
GSP32vaissu1u:274: aguṇavato dravyasya guṇārambhāt karmaguṇā aguṇāḥ | KVs_7,1.12 |
GSP32vaissu1u:277: aṇor mahataś copalabdhyanupalabdhī nitye vyākhyāte | KVs_7,1.15 |
GSP32vaissu1u:278: kāraṇabahutvāt kāraṇamahattvāt pracayaviśeṣāc ca mahat | KVs_7,1.16 |
GSP32vaissu1u:280: aṇu mahad iti tasmin viśeṣabhāvād viśeṣābhāvāc ca | KVs_7,1.18 |
GSP32vaissu1u:294: rūparasagandhasparśavyatirekād arthāntaram ekatvaṃ tathā pṛthaktvam | KVs_7,2.1 |
GSP32vaissu1u:295: tayor nityatvānityatve tejaso rūpasparśābhyāṃ vyākhyāte | KVs_7,2.2 |
GSP32vaissu1u:299: niḥsaṃkhyatvāt karmaguṇānāṃ sarvaikatvaṃ na vidyate | KVs_7,2.6 |
GSP32vaissu1u:303: anyatarakarmaja ubhayakarmajaḥ saṃyogajaś ca saṃyogaḥ | KVs_7,2.10 |
GSP32vaissu1u:307: yutasiddhyabhāvāt kāryakāraṇayoḥ saṃyogavibhāgau na vidyete | KVs_7,2.14 |
GSP32vaissu1u:313: saṃyogino daṇḍāt samavāyino viṣāṇāc ca | KVs_7,2.20 |
GSP32vaissu1u:322: iheti yataḥ kāryakāraṇayoḥ sa samavāyaḥ | KVs_7,2.29 |
GSP32vaissu1u:328: guṇakarmasv asannikṛṣṭeṣu jñānaniṣpatter dravyaṃ kāraṇaṃ kāraṇakāraṇaṃ ca | KVs_8.4 |
GSP32vaissu1u:329: sāmānyaviśeṣeṣu sāmānyaviśeṣābhāvāt tata eva jñānam | KVs_8.5 |
GSP32vaissu1u:332: guṇakarmasu guṇakarmābhāvad guṇakarmāpekṣaṃ na vidyate | KVs_8.8 |
GSP32vaissu1u:333: samavāyinaḥ śvaityāc chvaityabuddheḥ śvete buddhis te kāryakāraṇabhūte | KVs_8.9 |
GSP32vaissu1u:336: ayam eṣa kṛtaṃ tvayā bhojayāinam iti buddhyapekṣaṃ | KVs_8.12 |
GSP32vaissu1u:340: bhūyastvād gandhavattvāc ca pṛthivī gandhajñāne | KVs_8.16 |
GSP32vaissu1u:341: tathāpas tejo vāyuś ca rasarūpasparśajñāneṣu rasarūpasparśaviśeṣāt | KVs_8.17 |
GSP32vaissu1u:346: yac cānyat satas tad apy asat | KVs_9.5 |
GSP32vaissu1u:347: asad iti bhūtapratyakṣābhāvād bhūtasmṛter virodhipratyakṣatvāc ca jñānam | KVs_9.6 |
GSP32vaissu1u:351: nāsti ghaṭo geha iti sato ghaṭasya gehasaṃyogapratiṣedhaḥ | KVs_9.10 |
GSP32vaissu1u:352: nāsty anyaś candramā iti sāmānyāc candramasaḥ pratiṣedhaḥ | KVs_9.11 |
GSP32vaissu1u:353: sad asator vaidharmyāt kārye sad asattā na | KVs_9.12 |
GSP32vaissu1u:359: asyedaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ saṃbandhy ekārhtasamavāyi virodhi ceti laiṅgikam | KVs_9.18 |
GSP32vaissu1u:361: hetur apadeśo liṅgaṃ nimittaṃ pramāṇaṃ kāraṇam ity anarthāntaram | KVs_9.20 |
GSP32vaissu1u:363: ātmamanasoḥ saṃyogaviśeṣāt saṃskārāc ca smṛtiḥ | KVs_9.22 |
GSP32vaissu1u:370: ātmasamavāyaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ pañcabhyo 'rthāntaratve hetus tadāśrayibhyaś ca guṇebhyaḥ | KVs_10.1 |
GSP32vaissu1u:371: iṣṭāniṣṭakāraṇaviśeṣād virodhāc ca mithaḥ sukhaduḥkhayor arthāntarabhāvaḥ | KVs_10.2 |
GSP32vaissu1u:372: saṃśayanirṇayayor arthāntarabhāvaś ca jñānāntaratve hetuḥ | KVs_10.3 |
GSP32vaissu1u:373: tayor niṣpattiḥ pratyakṣalaiṅgikābhyāṃ jñānāntaratve hetuḥ | KVs_10.4 |
GSP32vaissu1u:379: ekārthasamavāyiṣu kāraṇāntareṣu darśanād ekadeśa ity ekasmin | KVs_10.10 |
GSP32vaissu1u:380: śiraḥ pṛṣṭham udaraṃ pāṇir iti tadviśeṣebhyaḥ | KVs_10.11 |
GSP32vaissu1u:389: dṛṣṭānāṃ dṛṣṭaprayojanānāṃ dṛṣṭābhāve prayogo 'bhyudayāya (S omits dṛṣṭaprayojanānāṃ) | KVs_10.20 |
GSP32vaissu1u:390: tadvacanād āmnāyaprāmāṇyam iti (U,S āmnāyasya prāmāṇyam) | KVs_10.21 |
